com.xtructure.xutil.config
Interface Fragment<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type whose parameters are described by this fragment.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Link.Fragment, Node.Fragment
public interface Fragment<T>

The Fragment interface describes delegate methods for use by objects, their XConfigurations, and serialization in a parameter-centric manner.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
